lumis.portal.filesystem.impl

Class ClusterMirroredFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.filesystem.impl.ClusterMirroredFileSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFileSystem

    public class ClusterMirroredFileSystem
extends Object
implements IFileSystem
    Main LumisPortal file system implementation. It replicates the file operations over the cluster by sending appropriate cluster commands. It keeps one copy for each file in each cluster server.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17047 $ $Date: 2015-03-03 11:22:22 -0300 (Tue, 03 Mar 2015) $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFile getFile(PortalFilePath portalFilePath)
      Returns a portal file to be manipulated for a given portal file path.
      Implementations must not return null.
      The portal file path parameter will never be null.
